name: Roaring Cat Games
comment: The Two Scoops do it again! This game is fantastic. Dragging around all those arms is a blast. The game is fun whether I’m doing poorly, or progressing along nicely ... Stellar job.

name: ManBeardGames
comment: Fun game, want more levels now...

name: Filipe Leal
comment: Very good game! Please do more levels! It reminds me the Cut the Rope game. Well done!

name: BinarySpark
comment: Cutesy game theme, with lovely sound effects...

name: gamesplusjames
comment: I really loved how the character moved as you dragged limbs around, it felt great ... I love the design and the music fit really well too!

name: Michael Clavell
comment: Fun game! Reminds me of Snipperclips a bit...

name: yodoG
comment: Really neat idea. Would love to see this on mobile with more levels and challenges.

name: Pilou
comment: Nice game, the chara design and the sounds it are just *cking cute ! I would love to see more levels of this!

name: Technomancy Studios
comment: YOU GUYS CAN’T KNOW ABOUT MY ONE ARM WILLY TACTIC!!!

name: Cubeeo
comment: ...I love the audio. It compliments the look. I feel like anyone any age could enjoy this. This is unique, well crafted and innovative. Excellent job!

name: eldogg
comment: Audio work is great. Gameplay is fun. Artwork is cute...

name: jasperarmstrong
comment: Pretty cool game! I could definitely see this being good for mobile. The art and music were both very nice...

name: ArtCat
comment: Love this game! A couple more tweaks and you are mobile ready! I love it when I touch my pal’ s tummy and it says 'football butt'!
